definition: Gigantoraptor erlianensis (a giant bird-like dinosaur found in Erlian in Inner Mongolia)

sentences.english: There is sufficient evidence that the bird is the offspring of maniraptoran dinosaur.
sentences.chinese: 壓倒性的證據顯示鳥類是手盜龍的後代。

sentences.english: Bambiraptor had a keen sniffer similar to that of a modern-day turkey vulture.
sentences.chinese: 斑比盜龍擁有與現代的土耳其禿鷹一樣敏銳的嗅覺。
